title: Divya Rekha: Diamond & Ruby Petaled Haaram

G color) and a central oval-cut Ruby of exceptional color saturation. Gold beads are meticulously crafted and polished to a high shine.

The antique finish (antique polish) gives it a timeless appeal.

description: This Haaram is a masterpiece of craftsmanship, blending the richness of tradition with contemporary design sensibilities.
